model_answer: The answer is C: [00:02:21 - 00:02:43]. The video mentions a white screen fading to a black screen with the on-screen question "How has Blizzcon been for you?" around the 21-second mark, and then shows Pathra Cadness at the Blizzard podium around the 22-second mark. She speaks about being lucky to be at BlizzCon thanks to Hearthstone Global Games and enjoying the opening presentation and meeting her stream viewers around the 23-second mark.
The segment is not present in the provided audio clip.
